channel.title: [resolved] Looking for Juan Ochoa
channel.description: Hello, I am looking for Juan Ochoa, a Bogota based artist and world famed RPG illustrator·ix. The name is terribly common and the contact form of their webpage is down. I need their permission to duplicate art for a free fan work translated version of a game. If you know of a way to contact them, please transfer this message or my email adress to them. Enjoy your day!

item.title: [resolved] Looking for Juan Ochoa
item.dc:creator: @DeReel
item.description:
@DeReel wrote:

Thank you! I hadn’t thought of that. Now my project can go on.
edit: Someone kindly gave me his email adress, so I’ve got all I need now.

Read full topic

item.title: [resolved] Looking for Juan Ochoa
item.dc:creator: @flatvurm
item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

If it helps, he’s pretty active on Twitter at @\CitizenOchoa, and he also lists a contact email address in his bio there.

Read full topic

item.title: [resolved] Looking for Juan Ochoa
item.dc:creator: @DeReel
item.description:
@DeReel wrote:

Hello,
I am looking for Juan Ochoa, a Bogota based artist and world famed RPG illustrator·ix. The name is terribly common and the contact form of their webpage is down. I need their permission to duplicate art for a free fan work translated version of a game. If you know of a way to contact them, please transfer this message or my email adress to them.
Enjoy your day!
